name: continental-crush--physical
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user summons a huge rock mountain using its Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user summons a huge rock mountain using its Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user summons a huge rock mountain using its Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
